DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : Primary - Determine whether genetic susceptibility ( e.g. , inherited difference radiation sensitivity normal tissue gene xenobiotic metabolism , nucleotide provision , DNA repair ) carcinogenic effect radiotherapy , tobacco , UV light modifies risk second malignant neoplasm ( SMN ) patient cancer treat hematopoietic stem cell transplantation ( HSCT ) . Secondary - Measure inherent sensitivity radiotherapy via G_2 chromosome radiation sensitivity assay use B-cell lymphoblastoid cell line derive pre-HSCT cryopreserved peripheral blood mononuclear cell patient without SMN . - Measure frequency allelic variant gene involve xenobiotics metabolism , DNA repair , provision nucleotide pool compare frequency among patient without SMN , determine transmission specific allele gene parent patient , correlate allelic variant DNA repair nucleotide provision gene vitro radiation sensitivity . - Evaluate role potentially carcinogenic environmental exposure ( tobacco sun light ) pre- post-HSCT risk SMN examine association exposures SMN interaction exposures allelic variant gene involve xenobiotic metabolism , nucleotide provision , DNA repair . OUTLINE : Patients complete self-reported questionnaire medical record review collect information UV light tobacco exposure pre- post-transplantation . Information analyze association second malignancy neoplasm . Blood sample collect patient pre-hematopoietic stem cell transplantation parent ( available ) first-degree relative genetic biomarkers susceptibility second malignancy , DNA repair provision nucleotide , genetic susceptibility toxicity combine cancer therapy , environmental carcinogen . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 1,000 patient ( 800 patient without second malignant neoplasm [ SMN ] 200 patient SMN ) accrue study .
DOC.criteria: CASES : Survived least 100 day posthematopoietic stem cell transplantation ( HSCT ) . Developed SMN time point . And receive TBI part preparative regimen . CONTROLS randomly select : In 4:1 ratio case cohort 100 day + survivor HSCT receive TBI . Controls match case race primary diagnosis . In addition , must survive least elapsed time case 's HSCT secondary cancer , without development SMN . We match primary diagnosis , genotype radiation sensitivity may predispose specific primary cancer , well SMNs . We match race , allele frequency vary widely across ethnic group .
